video.title: Air Disasters
video.synopsis: Employing digital imagery, cockpit recordings and the recollections of eyewitnesses, this series reviews history's most shocking aviation disasters.

episodes.synopsis: When a plane full of tourists plunges 30,000 feet into the mountains of Venezuela, investigators uncover myriad factors behind the crash.
episodes.title: The Plane that Flew Too High

episodes.synopsis: Tensions escalate between the U.S. and the U.S.S.R. when a Korean Airlines flight is shot down by a Soviet jet, and an anxious investigation ensues.
episodes.title: Target Destroyed

episodes.synopsis: From violent gusts to volcanic ash, relive the severe weather disasters that forced the industry to better protect planes against Mother Nature.
episodes.title: Cruel Skies

episodes.synopsis: A horrific British aviation disaster unfolds on a plane that never leaves the ground when an engine fire proves less deadly than the fumes released.
episodes.title: Panic On the Runway

episodes.synopsis: It was an historic U.S. tragedy with an improbable twist: A jet crashed seconds after takeoff, killing everyone aboard except a 4-year-old girl.
episodes.title: Alarming Silence

episodes.synopsis: When a plane taking off from LaGuardia Airport tumbles into icy waters, stunned investigators see echoes of another crash just a few years earlier.
episodes.title: Cold Case

episodes.synopsis: It was supposed to be the world's slickest new jet, but the Airbus A320 crashed on its maiden flight, sending investigators scrambling for answers.
episodes.title: Pilot vs. Plane

episodes.synopsis: An overloaded and insufficient air traffic control system is examined as a promising new one -- NexGen -- is explored and described by test pilots.
episodes.title: System Breakdown

episodes.synopsis: Minutes from landing in Strasbourg, an airbus crashes into a mountain range and is lost in a snowy forest. Flaws in the plane's design are revealed.
episodes.title: The Final Blow

episodes.synopsis: A fatal crash at LAX, one of the world's busiest airports, occurs when one plane sets for takeoff and another prepares to land -- on the same runway.
episodes.title: Cleared for Disaster

episodes.synopsis: After a seaplane carrying a Bacardi VIP crashes in front of hundreds of tourists in Miami Beach, investigators look for signs of foul play.
episodes.title: Cracks in the System
